card.name: Acidic Slime
card.text: Deathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.) When Acidic Slime enters the battlefield, destroy target artifact, enchantment, or land.

card.name: Bloodbraid Elf
card.text: Haste Cascade (When you cast this spell, exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a nonland card that costs less. You may cast it without paying its mana cost. Put the exiled cards on the bottom of your library in a random order.)

card.name: Bloodghast
card.text: Bloodghast can't block. Bloodghast has haste as long as an opponent has 10 or less life. Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you may return Bloodghast from your graveyard to the battlefield.

card.name: Echoing Decay
card.text: Target creature and all other creatures with the same name as that creature get -2/-2 until end of turn.

card.name: Fiery Islet
card.text: {T}, Pay 1 life: Add {U} or {R}. {1}, {T}, Sacrifice Fiery Islet: Draw a card.

card.name: Frost Titan
card.text: Whenever Frost Titan becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter that spell or ability unless its controller pays {2}. Whenever Frost Titan enters the battlefield or attacks, tap target permanent. It doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.

card.name: Giver of Runes
card.text: {T}: Another target creature you control gains protection from colorless or from the color of your choice until end of turn.

card.name: Grave Titan
card.text: Deathtouch Whenever Grave Titan enters the battlefield or attacks, create two 2/2 black Zombie creature tokens.

card.name: Inferno Titan
card.text: {R}: Inferno Titan gets +1/+0 until end of turn. Whenever Inferno Titan enters the battlefield or attacks, it deals 3 damage divided as you choose among one, two, or three targets.

card.name: Mortarpod
Nurturing Peatland
card.text: {T}, Pay 1 life: Add {B} or {G}. {1}, {T}, Sacrifice Nurturing Peatland: Draw a card.

card.name: Primeval Titan
card.text: Trample Whenever Primeval Titan enters the battlefield or attacks, you may search your library for up to two land cards, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

card.name: Repeal
card.text: Return target nonland permanent with mana value X to its owner's hand. Draw a card.

card.name: Silent Clearing
card.text: {T}, Pay 1 life: Add {W} or {B}. {1}, {T}, Sacrifice Silent Clearing: Draw a card.

card.name: Sun Titan
card.text: Vigilance Whenever Sun Titan enters the battlefield or attacks, you may return target permanent card with mana value 3 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.

card.name: Sunbaked Canyon
card.text: {T}, Pay 1 life: Add {R} or {W}. {1}, {T}, Sacrifice Sunbaked Canyon: Draw a card.

card.name: Sword of Fire and Ice
Tooth and Nail
card.text: Choose one — • Search your library for up to two creature cards, reveal them, put them into your hand, then shuffle. • Put up to two creature cards from your hand onto the battlefield. Entwine {2} (Choose both if you pay the entwine cost.)

card.name: Tribal Flames
card.text: Domain — Tribal Flames deals X damage to any target, where X is the number of basic land types among lands you control.

card.name: Unearth
card.text: Return target creature card with mana value 3 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield. Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

card.name: Vendilion Clique
card.text: Flash Flying When Vendilion Clique enters the battlefield, look at target player's hand. You may choose a nonland card from it. If you do, that player reveals the chosen card, puts it on the bottom of their library, then draws a card.

card.name: Waterlogged Grove
card.text: {T}, Pay 1 life: Add {G} or {U}. {1}, {T}, Sacrifice Waterlogged Grove: Draw a card.

card.name: Wayfarer's Bauble
card.text: {2}, {T}, Sacrifice Wayfarer's Bauble: Search your library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

card.name: Wild Nacatl
card.text: Wild Nacatl gets +1/+1 as long as you control a Mountain. Wild Nacatl gets +1/+1 as long as you control a Plains.

card.name: Worn Powerstone
card.text: Worn Powerstone enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {C}{C}.
